description: Extensibility is an ability to add or extend additional elements and features to the existing solution.
The ability for authorized users to easily access and use the solution from anywhere.
The ability to easily manage and update the solution.
To secure the solution and data is only available to those who have appropriate access.
The solution works consistently and can be counted on from a business perspective and performs as expected.
The solution performs quickly enough to meet the business demand.
The solution learns or provides new insights.
Consistency means having solution work reliably and in the same manner every time.
The solution should be able to produce its own documentation.
Each component of the solution should be able to perform its own unit test.
The solution should be smart enough to explain itself to a non-technical human.
The solution should be lean and choose the simplest method of achievement.
If the solution is built in python it is built using the python way.
The solution should contain the minimal code or no code required to achieve objective.
